topic.title: Active Directory Federation Services
topic.shortdesc: What's New in Active Directory Federation Services. Active Directory Federation Services AD FS in Windows Server 2016 includes new features that enable you to configure AD FS to authenticate users stored in Lightweight Directory Access Protocol LDAP directories. For more information, see What's New in AD FS for Windows Server 2016../identity/ad-fs/overview/whats-new-active-directory-federation-services-windows-server.md.
